stories.text:
What are your thoughts on a Pokémon style game with cyborg animals whose strengths/weaknesses, and special battle cards are built into the code with monthly automatic competitions running through random battle scenarios for NFT holders and NFT awards for the winners with a leaderboard?

Build your virtual army of Cyborg Pokémon in Web3 and battle your friends or compete globally.
